Salah was involved in an Africa Cup of Nations qualifier for Egypt on Monday, June 12 - playing 90 minutes in a 1-0 loss to Tunisia - the day before Adam Lallana's last game of the season for England against France.

Both players will be on the same timescale in terms of a return and will certainly not be among the first wave of arrivals to return for pre-season on July 5 and 6.

That will almost certainly rule out Salah playing any part in the first two pre-season games at Tranmere on July 12 and Wigan on July 14.

A trip to Hong Kong then awaits Liverpool for the Premier League Asia Trophy (July 19-22) before the Audi Cup in Germany (August 1/2)) and it will be in one of these tournaments where his Liverpool career is likely to get underway, fitness permitting.

The final wave of Liverpool players to return for pre-season will include Emre Can and Marko Grujic who are still competing in the Confederations Cup and Euro U21 championships respectively.

Salah was involved in an Africa Cup of Nations qualifier for Egypt on Monday, June 12 - playing 90 minutes in a 1-0 loss to Tunisia - the day before Adam Lallana's last game of the season for England against France.

Both players will be on the same timescale in terms of a return and will certainly not be among the first wave of arrivals to return for pre-season on July 5 and 6.

That will almost certainly rule out Salah playing any part in the first two pre-season games at Tranmere on July 12 and Wigan on July 14.

A trip to Hong Kong then awaits Liverpool for the Premier League Asia Trophy (July 19-22) before the Audi Cup in Germany (August 1/2)) and it will be in one of these tournaments where his Liverpool career is likely to get underway, fitness permitting.

The final wave of Liverpool players to return for pre-season will include Emre Can and Marko Grujic who are still competing in the Confederations Cup and Euro U21 championships respectively.

Who is Mauricio Pellegrino?

Pellegrino previously worked at Independiente and Estudiantes in his native Argentina, joining the latter after he was fired by Valencia - his first job in management - following seven months in charge.

Prior to his appointment by the Spanish club in May 2012, Pellegrino worked as a coach under Rafael Benitez at Liverpool (2008 to 2010) and Inter Milan (2010).

As a player he made 13 appearances for Liverpool in 2005, after being signed by Benitez, who he also played for during six years at Valencia from 1999.

不少球星的童年都是生活在極貧窮環境之中，34歲的丹尼爾亦不例外。他出身巴西東部巴伊亞州的城市茹阿澤魯（Juazeiro），憑自身努力，在球壇17年，在西甲效力過西維爾和巴塞隆拿後，如今經已成為一個頂尖右翼衛。
未知是否與他快將尋求新挑戰（盛傳轉投曼城與領隊哥迪奧拿重逢），近日他在Instagram發布身在家鄉的相片和短片，分享了他年少時踢足球的地方，笑指如有機會，希望可以與美斯和尼馬在這個小球場較量一番，並說：「回到家鄉對淨化我的快樂滿有作用，我在這裏不需金錢或讚賞，只要健康和休息。」
另邊廂，巴塞隆拿前鋒蘇亞雷斯，日前也返到祖國烏拉圭南部城市蒙特維多，主持一個以他命名的足球場開幕典禮，重返自己童年經常踢波、此後成為一名專業足球員的地方，難怪阿蘇開幕禮致辭時激動得落淚：「能夠重返舊地令我非常感觸，年青球員也許會在足球路上遇到不少困難，但我希望大家能享受其中，永遠不要放棄自己夢想」。
同樣曾效力巴塞、現貴為阿仙奴當打球星的智利前鋒阿歷斯山齊士，今年3月也曾重返其家鄉城市Tocopilla，為個人的大型雕像主持剪綵，雕像旁的石碑除了有「山神」的手印和腳印，還有當事人親自寫上的勉勵說話：「不要因為某些人告訴你不能做到好些事情而感到傷心，若果你有夢想，就必須要堅守到底。」
